        public ModelServerNode(FsDirectory rootDir,

        register - register flag

      • ModelServerNode

        public ModelServerNode(FsDirectory rootDir)

        Parameters:
        rootDir - root directory

      • ModelServerNode

        public ModelServerNode(boolean register)
        Creates new instance of a client node. Instance can be registered to ModelNodeRegistry by setting register flag. Root directory defaults to ROOT_DIR_NAME.
        Parameters:
        register - register flag

      • ModelServerNode

        public ModelServerNode()
        Creates new instance of a server node that will be registered to ModelNodeRegistry.
